author: Sara Fischer
title: Brands risk losing business if they don't properly address coronavirus
description: People are more likely to purchase something from a company during and after the coronavirus crisis if that company speaks out appropriately about the pandemic now, according to a new survey from Edelman. The big picture: Data shows that consumers overwhelmin…
content:
People are more likely to purchase something from a company during and after the coronavirus crisis if that company speaks out appropriately about the pandemic now, according to a new survey from Edelman.
